profile.name: Reza Rasoulzadeh
profile.title: Freelance designer and developer
profile.description: Creative graphic, userinterface designer and cross-platform developer with 7 years of experience in logo, poster, magazine, cover and UI/UX design and cross-platform development.

employmentHistory.title: Graphic Designer, Freelancer
subItems: Successfully completed several freelance Graphic Design jobs with a strong customer satisfaction rate.
Ensured that the visions of the director and designer were carried out through production.

employmentHistory.title: Junior Graphic Designer
subItems: Worked on various print media design projects including brochures, flyers, and posters.
Collaborated with senior designers to implement design ideas for client projects.
